AB-CO Group Mandate
home | mandate | sections | projects | meetings | Presentations
  1. Provide the control system for the LHC commissioning and operation including the extensions and rationalisations needed in its chain of pre-injectors. Develop controls solutions suiting the specific needs of the machines in close collaboration with the equipment groups. Integrate industrial solutions wherever possible and the turn-key systems provided by the external contractors. The domain of responsibility extends from the front-end computers in relation with the equipment up to the applications programs for operation developed in collaboration with the Operations Group on the basis of environment and tools provided by the group. It includes a general timing and an alarm systems.
  2. Provide the infrastructure for the LHC magnet systems and its related test stands during the development phase. These activities are mainly performed in the frame of the new AT Division.
  3. Operate and actively support the control systems of all the accelerators and facilities of the AB Division according to the physics program.
  4. Provide a number of services to the AB Division such as database support, web expertise, desktop infrastructure management, instrument repair.
  5. Provide central services for the LHC project : qualification to radiation for electronics equipment; layout of the electronics equipment in the LHC tunnel, underground areas and parts of the surface buildings.
  6. Provide support and expertise at the CERN level on Fieldbuses and industrial interfaces (PLCs).
  7. Provide some support to The Technical Control Room (ST) and to TIS on the part of the controls infrastructure they had in common with SL/CO.
